## Example 1

Add alt text using the `fig-alt:` code chunk option:

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| fig-align: "center"
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)

ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g, fill = species)) +
  geom_histogram(alpha = 0.5, 
                 position = "identity") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) +
  labs(x = "Body mass (g)",
       y = "Frequency",
       title = "Penguin body masses")
```
